links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (26, -49, 24).
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[1, 26, 627]; [n le 3 select I[n] else 26*Self(n-1) - 49*Self(n-2) + 24*Self(n-3): n in [1..20]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Oct 19 2012
